settings.text: Our 200-acre facility features multiple tracks and trails designed for riders of all skill levels. From beginner-friendly sections to challenging pro-level obstacles, BCMC has something for everyone.

Length: 1.2 miles

Difficulty: Intermediate to Expert

Features: Multiple rhythm sections, tabletops, step-ups, whoops, and technical corners

Best For: Motocross racing, practice, and training

Track Conditions: Professionally maintained with regular grooming and watering

Length: 0.8 miles

Difficulty: Beginner to Intermediate

Features: Classic motocross layout with natural terrain, smaller jumps, and flowing corners

Best For: Vintage bikes, beginners, and family riding

Special Events: Vintage bike weekends and classic motocross races

Total Length: 15+ miles of trails

Difficulty: All levels

Features: Wooded single-track, open field sections, creek crossings, and hill climbs

Best For: Enduro riding, trail riding, and adventure bikes

Trail Marking: Color-coded difficulty levels (Green = Easy, Blue = Intermediate, Black = Expert)

On-Site Facilities

  • Pit Area: Large paved pit area with electrical hookups
  • Concession Stand: Food and beverages available during events
  • Merch Shop: Shop apparel and accessories
  • Restrooms: Clean facilities
  • Spectator Areas: Multiple viewing areas around tracks
  • Camping: Primitive camping available for events
  • First Aid: On-site medical support during events

Safety & Rules

  • AMA membership required for all riders
  • Proper safety equipment mandatory
  • Helmet, boots, goggles, and protective gear required
  • No alcohol consumption
  • Respect all posted speed limits and rules
  • Report any track issues to staff immediately
